channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 women's health myths, debunked by doctors
item.description: Some common misconceptions keep women from taking optimal care of their health. Here, doctors set the record straight.

item.title: Spain's Catholic Church signs deal on sexual abuse compensation
item.description: The accord follows complaints that religious leaders had failed to tackle the issue adequately.

item.title: US halts assistance to Somalia over claims food aid was illegally seized
item.description: Somalia denies the claims and says the 76 tonnes of aid is still in the hands of the World Food Programme.

item.description: The army says it has met its goal of clearing the area of non-state weapons but Israel calls the move "insufficient".
